column5: I wonder how many remember this..........    Merry Christmas everyone!
Thanks for the smile Roger!!! Hope you find yourself making a few this Christmas yourself!!
Yes,remember it well.  Merry Christmas Roger.
Merry Christmas Roger!  I think we need to re-christen my boat with a roger smile this spring...  Be well my friend, Steve
Thank you Roger. Not only a Christmas song but something I play anytime of the year. Take care of yourself my friend.
Hearing this for the first time just made it my favorite Christmas song ... lol Thank you for sharing ....Merry Christmas .
Nice to hear from you roger !!!! Merry Xmas !!! How are you doing,wish you all the best in the new year

Nice to hear from you all.  A busy day tomorrow with the boys and their families and then get ready for Florida!  Gettin' too cold around here. There's ice forming on the water, a sign to leave Gotta go to where the water is a little softer Steve, the salmon in the video was from your boat!  Would love to do it again. Have a wonderful day tomorrow gentlemen and nothing but the very best in the New Year!
Take care roger !!! Have a great trip and stop in and say hi to us on the board here !!!! Cheers enjoy the sunshine....
I remember Happy Holidays Roger and hope you havea great winter down south
Thank's for that Roger. I will play it often. Have fun in Florida, I'm sure you will have a great week with the FishGut's.
Always enjoy your music Roger and have a great time in the sunny south.  And the girls say "hey"
